# Inactive: Quality & Security

These agents live in `inactive/agents/` and can be activated by moving them into `agents/`.

[‚Üê Back to Inactive Agent Library](inactive-library.html)

| Agent | Category | Model | Summary |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `architect-reviewer` | quality-security | opus | Evaluates changes for architectural integrity, layering, and long-term maintainability. |
| `code-reviewer` | quality-security | sonnet | Senior reviewer focused on safety, reliability, and maintainability of code and configuration changes. |
| `compliance-auditor` | quality-security | sonnet | Ensures regulatory compliance across frameworks with automated evidence collection and monitoring. |
| `jwt-expert` | quality-security | sonnet | JWT specialist for token issuance, validation, and cryptographic safety. |
| `oauth-oidc-expert` | quality-security | sonnet | OAuth2/OIDC specialist for secure identity flows and SSO integrations. |
| `owasp-top10-expert` | quality-security | sonnet | OWASP Top 10 specialist for security risk assessment and mitigation. |
| `penetration-tester` | quality-security | sonnet | Performs ethical hacking campaigns to discover, exploit, and document security weaknesses safely. |
| `performance-engineer` | quality-security | sonnet | Improves system performance with data-driven profiling, bottleneck analysis, and verified optimizations. |
| `playwright-expert` | quality-security | sonnet | Playwright specialist for reliable end-to-end browser testing. |
| `quality-engineer` | quality-security | sonnet | Designs data-driven quality strategies, edge-case coverage, and automation to prevent regressions. |
| `test-automator` | quality-security | sonnet | Builds reliable automated test suites across unit, integration, and end-to-end layers with CI integration. |
| `vitest-expert` | quality-security | sonnet | Vitest specialist for fast unit tests in Vite-based projects. |
